DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand happen someone either becomes active inactive . This study measure energy intake , energy expenditure , body composition normal condition , become active , become inactive .
DOC.criteria: Men woman Age 2535 yr BMI ≥25.0 < 35.0 kg/m2 Subjective physical activity ( pre runin ) : Sedentary previous 3 month ( < 20min , 3 times/week structure exercise ) Objective physical activity ( runin ) : daily steps/day > 4500 yet < 7,000 7 day runin period Weightstable ( ± 5 % ) within previous 3 month Nonsmoking last year Able provide transportation study visit intervention Not currently involve research study Willing able participate aspect trial include research test Willing give inform consent participate Able participate moderate physical exercise program Selfreported significant cardiovascular disease include limited serious arrhythmia , cardiomyopathy , congestive heart failure , myocardial infarction , stroke Other selfreported medical condition include limited metabolic disorder diabetes , chronic recurrent respiratory condition , active cancer , musculoskeletal disease interfere exercise , serious medical condition may affect adherence protocol exercise safely , aggravate exercise Medications know affect exercise performance metabolism ( e.g . thyroid medication , betablockers , stimulant ) Excess caffeine use ( > 500mg/day ) Restrained eater ( > 13 ) restraint section threefactor eat questionnaire Current past diagnosis eat disorder Any selfreported contraindication exercise accord American College Sports Medicine criterion Pregnant actively try become pregnant Gave birth past 12 month < 6 month postlactation Other medical , psychiatric behavioral factor judgment principal investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol .
